name: Unauthorized access when not logged in
methodName: Unauthorized access when not logged in

testSteps.description: Given a book exists in the database with title "Test Book", and author "Test Author"

children.description: authenticate with username: user and password: password

restQuery.responseHeaders:
WWW-Authenticate: Basic realm="Realm"
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Set-Cookie: JSESSIONID=D0028F36E8A4B00E542ECB3A4D17056D; Path=/; HttpOnly
WWW-Authenticate: Basic realm="Realm"
Content-Length: 0
Date: Fri, 03 Jan 2025 08:57:49 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

testSteps.description: And the user is not logged in
When user requests book details by ID 0

title: Unauthorized access when not logged in
